website_summaries.verdict: A high-speed three-wheel scooter for kids who aren't ready to make the jump to two-wheeled models.
pros: The lightweight design makes this a great choice for younger kids
Larger wheels make for a smooth ride
cons: Several customers had issues with the front axle breaking

customer_reviews.title: Broken but replacement piece sent
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy. We bought our daughter this scooter exactly a year ago. We live in Indiana so it went unused for at least 5 of the last 12 months. Today, the piece of plastic the holds the wheel in place snapped. The location of the break makes it un-fixable. For the money we spent for this scooter, I had expected it be last much longer. Update: the company ended up sending us a replacement part so we were able to use the scooter again!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My 8-yr old wanted a 3-wheel scooter, and after reading all the reviews, I decided to give this one a chance. Assembly was very simple...snap the handle bars into the receptacle above the front wheels, and done! Several miles later, the scooter seems to be holding up to the abuse that an 8-yr old can dish out. The handle bar extends, and is easily tall enough for another year or two of use, before it's outgrown. My kid's happy, and that makes dad happy! I'll recommend this to anyone. If the handle bars folded down for easy stowage, I would have given 5 stars. If that's not an issue for you, then you cannot go wrong with this scooter.
